-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public."Empoyers"
(
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    "companyName" character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    "webSite" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("userId")
);

CREATE TABLE public."JobPositions"
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(80) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."JobSeekers"
(
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    "firstName" character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    "lastName" character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    "dateOfBirth" date NOT NULL,
    "nationalityId" character varying(11) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("userId")
);

CREATE TABLE public."PhoneNumbers"
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "empoyerId" integer NOT NULL,
    "phoneNumber" character varying(15) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."SystemWorkers"
(
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    "firstName" character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    "lastName" character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("userId")
);

CREATE TABLE public."UserVerificationsWithCode"
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    "isConfirmed" boolean NOT NULL,
    "confirmationDate" date NOT NULL,
    "verificationCodeId" integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."UserVerificationsWithSystem"
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    "isConfirmed" boolean NOT NULL,
    "confirmationDate" date NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."Users"
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    password character varying(80) NOT NULL,
    email character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."VerificationsCodes"
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "verificationCode" character varying(36) NOT NULL,
    "createDate" date NOT NULL,
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE public."Empoyers"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Users" (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."JobSeekers"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Users" (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."PhoneNumbers"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("empoyerId")
    REFERENCES public."Empoyers" ("userId")
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."SystemWorkers"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Users" (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."UserVerificationsWithCode"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Users" (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."UserVerificationsWithSystem"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Users" (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."VerificationsCodes"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public."Users" (id)
    NOT VALID;

END;
